doc:
Tony Becker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Becker 0 Tony Becker (born September 14, 1963 in Los Angeles, California) is an American actor best known for his role as Private Daniel 'Danny' Purcell on the 1987-1990 CBS Vietnam War series Tour of Duty. Tony_Becker ( born September_14_,_1963 in Los_Angeles , California ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_role as Private_Daniel_'_Danny_'_Purcell on the_1987-1990_CBS_Vietnam_War_series_Tour of Duty .
